channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for OK
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for OK

item.title: Report X-2024010266
item.description:
Report X-2024010266

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-17T15:11:26+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-21
  • City: EDMOND
  • State: OK
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was brought to QA, leaking. Placed in tote. DescribePack: Outer package contains the canned product inside its manufactured packaging, surrounded with paper. Cans have loose lids, are dented, and are spilling contents possibly due to no paint clips. Outer packaging does not have a diamond or fragile liquid transport label. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Placed in tote.
